object.creator: 开发者
object.name: lcIB_CXDDMJZJHCSPLC
object.package: 99_工作流程.07_持续阶段.持续督导募集资金存放与使用情况专项核查报告审批流程
object.describe: 持续督导募集资金存放与使用情况专项核查报告审批流程

column.name: ZYLDYJ
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcIB_CXDDMJZJHCSPLC";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

column.name: MJZJSFSYWB
column.describe: 募集资金是否使用完毕

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: BHRQ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if(XMMC.XMLX!=5&&XMMC.XMLX!=6&&XMMC.XMLX!=7&&XMMC.XMLX!=10){
O_THIS.getColumn("BHRQ").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>报会日期");
O_THIS.getColumn("GHRQ").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>过会日期");
O_THIS.getColumn("FXRQ").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>发行日期");
O_THIS.getColumn("SSRQ").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>上市日期");
}else{
O_THIS.getColumn("BHRQ").setLabel("报会日期");
O_THIS.getColumn("GHRQ").setLabel("过会日期");
O_THIS.getColumn("FXRQ").setLabel("发行日期");
O_THIS.getColumn("SSRQ").setLabel("上市日期");
}
1==2

column.name: CXDDXGBGLX
column.describe: 持续督导相关报告类型

column.name: NHBZS
column.default: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select NHBZS from ecif.tIB_LCNHZYZSPZB where LCDM='lcIB_CXDDMJZJHCSPLC' and QYZT=1")

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
“请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致”、“该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行”'

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_CXDDMJZJHCSPLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_CXDDMJZJHCSPLC&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_CXDDMJZJHCSPLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");
